ai-ja154:1.1_0: “For one who has entered bad fortune,
ai-ja154:1.2_0: by one who desires a comrade,
ai-ja154:2.1_0: “About Brahmā, you live for a long time,
ai-ja154:2.2_0: let the water appear in the day.
ai-ja154:2.3_0: * He who made the praise of the Brahmā,
ai-ja154:2.4_0: you must tell us to cross over it.”
